questionnaire.title: Symptom Assessment
questionnaire.processing: All questions have been answered. Processing your responses...
questionnaire.imageNotAvailable: Image not available - will be added soon
questionnaire.provideInfo: Please provide information about the plant condition for analysis:

boreholes_plugged_excreta.text: Are there boreholes plugged with excreta visible on the plant?
boreholes_plugged_excreta.description: Look for small holes in the stem that are filled with insect waste material

central_whorl_dry_withered.text: Is the central whorl dry and withered?
central_whorl_dry_withered.description: Check if the innermost leaves at the center of the plant are dried up

affected_shoots_come_off_easily.text: Do affected shoots come off easily when pulled?
affected_shoots_come_off_easily.description: Gently pull the central shoot to see if it detaches without resistance

affected_shoots_wilting_drying.text: Are affected shoots showing signs of wilting and drying?
affected_shoots_wilting_drying.description: Look for shoots that are losing their green color and becoming dry

caterpillars_destroying_shoots.text: Are there caterpillars visible destroying the shoots?
caterpillars_destroying_shoots.description: Check for the presence of larvae feeding on the plant shoots

reduction_millable_canes.text: Is there a noticeable reduction in millable canes?
reduction_millable_canes.description: Compare with healthy plants to see if cane production is reduced

bore_holes_base_ground_level.text: Are there bore holes visible at the base near ground level?
bore_holes_base_ground_level.description: Examine the stem base close to soil level for entry holes

dirty_white_larvae_violet_stripes.text: Can you see dirty white larvae with violet stripes?
dirty_white_larvae_violet_stripes.description: Look for caterpillars with distinctive white body and purple markings

central_shoot_comes_out_easily.text: Does the central shoot come out easily when pulled?
central_shoot_comes_out_easily.description: Test if the main growing point can be removed without force

small_holes_stem_near_ground.text: Are there small holes in the stem near the ground?
small_holes_stem_near_ground.description: Check the lower portion of the stem for insect entry points

crop_early_growth_phase.text: Is the crop in its early growth phase (1-3 months)?
crop_early_growth_phase.description: Consider the age of the sugarcane crop when symptoms appeared

leaves_drying_tip_margins.text: Are leaves drying from tip and margins?
leaves_drying_tip_margins.description: Look for browning that starts at leaf tips and edges

plant_yellow_wilted.text: Is the plant showing yellowing and wilting symptoms?
plant_yellow_wilted.description: Check for overall plant stress with yellow coloration

rotten_central_shoot_foul_odor.text: Is there a rotten central shoot with foul odor?
rotten_central_shoot_foul_odor.description: Smell for any unpleasant odor from the decaying central growing point

rotten_straw_colored_dead_heart.text: Is there a rotten, straw-colored dead heart visible?
rotten_straw_colored_dead_heart.description: Look for the characteristic dried, yellowish-brown central shoot

affected_setts_spreading.text: Are affected setts spreading the symptoms to nearby plants?
affected_setts_spreading.description: Check if the problem is spreading from infected planting material

plants_stunted_slow_growth.text: Are plants showing stunted and slow growth?
plants_stunted_slow_growth.description: Compare plant height and vigor with healthy plants

honey_dew_sooty_mould.text: Is there honey dew and sooty mould present?
honey_dew_sooty_mould.description: Look for sticky secretions and black fungal growth on leaves

nodal_regions_infested.text: Are nodal regions heavily infested with insects?
nodal_regions_infested.description: Check the joints of the stem for high insect populations

tillers_white_yellow.text: Are tillers showing white to yellow coloration?
tillers_white_yellow.description: Look for side shoots that have lost their green color

high_aphid_population.text: Is there a high population of aphids visible?
high_aphid_population.description: Check for clusters of small, soft-bodied insects on plants

gaps_early_drying.text: Are there gaps in the field due to early plant drying?
gaps_early_drying.description: Look for missing plants or dead spots in the field

cane_stunted_reduced_internodes.text: Are canes stunted with reduced internodes?
cane_stunted_reduced_internodes.description: Check if stem segments between nodes are shorter than normal

no_millable_cane_formation.text: Is there no millable cane formation?
no_millable_cane_formation.description: Assess if plants are failing to produce harvestable canes

profuse_lateral_buds.text: Are there profuse lateral buds sprouting?
profuse_lateral_buds.description: Look for excessive side bud development along the stem

woolly_matter_deposition.text: Is there woolly matter deposition on plants?
woolly_matter_deposition.description: Check for white, cotton-like material on plant surfaces

gradual_yellowing_drying.text: Is there gradual yellowing and drying of plants?
gradual_yellowing_drying.description: Look for progressive color change from green to yellow to brown

yellowing_from_tip_margins.text: Is yellowing starting from leaf tips and margins?
yellowing_from_tip_margins.description: Check if discoloration begins at leaf edges and spreads inward

profuse_tillering_3_4_months.text: Is there profuse tillering at 3-4 months after planting?
profuse_tillering_3_4_months.description: Count the number of shoots per plant at this growth stage

ratoon_crop_present.text: Is this a ratoon crop (regrowth after harvest)?
ratoon_crop_present.description: Determine if this is the first crop or regrowth from previous harvest
